back_end.car_rental module¶

class back_end.car_rental.CarRentalService(my_host, my_port, username, password)¶

Bases: object

add_car(vin: str, mileage: int, mpg: int, price: float, license_plate: str, car_year: str, model: str, make: str, color: str, car_type: str) → None¶

Function: add_car(vin, mileage, mpg, price, license_plate, car_year, model, make, color, car_type) Description: calls the function of inventory class to add car to current inventory

add_report(car_id: int, damages: str, gas_amount: int, reservation_id: int)¶

Function: add_report(car_id, damages, gas_amount, reservation_id) Description: calls add_report from car class to assign a report to a car

connect_to_mysql()¶

Function: connect_to_mysql()

Initializes the connection to the database for future queries.

Returns:

None

customer_search(start_date: str, end_date: str, car_type: str) → list[tuple]¶

Function: customer_search(start_date, end_date, car_type) Description: calls the search_database() method from database utility class

delete_car(car_id: int) → None¶

Function: delete_car(car_id) Description: calls retire_car from car class to deactive the car

delete_multiple_cars(car_ids: list[int]) → None¶

Function: delete_multiple_cars(car_ids) Description: basically a loop function for delete_car function to be able to delete multiple cars

get_inventory_admin()¶

Retrieves all active cars in the inventory for administrative purposes.

Returns¶

list

List of active cars in the inventory.

get_reservations()¶

Retrieves all active reservations from the database.

Returns¶

list

List of active reservations.

make_reservation(start_date, end_date, insurance, customer_email, car_id)¶

Makes a reservation for a car and sends an invoice to the customer.

Parameters¶

start_datestr

Start date for the reservation.

end_datestr

End date for the reservation.

insurancebool

Whether the customer opted for insurance.

customer_emailstr

Email address of the customer.

car_idint

The ID of the car being reserved.

send_invoice(customer_email: str, car_id: int, start_date: str, insurance: bool, end_date: str) → None¶

Sends an invoice to the customer via email.

Parameters¶

customer_emailstr

Email address of the customer.

car_idint

The ID of the car.

start_datestr

Start date of the reservation.

insurancebool

Insurance status for the reservation.

end_datestr

End date of the reservation.
